TITLE: Online Collaborative Spaces
DEF: Persistent virtual environments for joint work on shared assets
TASK: Online collaborative spaces are persistent virtual environments for joint work on shared assets. They facilitate real-time and asynchronous interaction, cooperative problem-solving, and collective knowledge-building. To optimize these spaces, establish clear communication protocols, define roles and responsibilities, and use readily accessible tools that do not require additional installations or infrastructure. Keep user-friendly interfaces and accessibility features in mind.
